name: Zenith X1 Smartphone
description: The Zenith X1 Smartphone features a 6.5-inch display, a powerful 5000mAh battery, and a 48MP rear camera for stunning photos. Perfect for those looking for a high-performance device at an affordable price.

name: AeroBook Pro Laptop
description: The AeroBook Pro Laptop is equipped with a powerful Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB of RAM, and a 512GB SSD. With a 15.6-inch display and sleek design, it's ideal for professionals and students alike.

name: EchoWave Wireless Headphones
description: The EchoWave Wireless Headphones offer immersive sound quality with noise-canceling technology. The comfortable over-ear design and long battery life make them perfect for all-day use.

name: NeonFit Smartwatch
description: The NeonFit Smartwatch tracks your fitness progress with features like heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and activity tracking. Stay connected with notifications, all on your wrist.

name: HyperTab 10 Tablet
description: The HyperTab 10 Tablet features a 10-inch display, powerful quad-core processor, and 64GB of storage, making it perfect for work and entertainment on the go.

name: PhotonX Digital Camera
description: Capture stunning photos and videos with the PhotonX Digital Camera. Featuring a 24MP sensor and 4K video recording, itâ€™s the perfect choice for budding photographers and content creators.
